title: TimesTalks Luminato Festival Video: Liz Diller

text: The architect Liz Diller, of Diller Scofidio & Renfro, the award-winning architecture firm whose many projects include re-envisioning New Yorkâ€™s Lincoln Center and transforming the High Line into an urban oasis, talks with the Times culture reporter Robin Pogrebin.
